wikipedia_page.main: Mike Rafter (born 31 March 1952) is a rugby union coach and former Bristol and England flanker.

response: Under Mike Rafter's captaincy, the club won the John Player Cup in 1983, defeating Leicester 28–22. During this period Alan Morley established a world record of 479 tries in senior rugby. The centenary season with Nigel Pomphrey as captain was celebrated in style with a game against the Barbarians and a narrow defeat in the cup final.
